Which Training Gadget?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Which Training Gadget?
By Apocalypse on Wednesday, January 4, 2006 - 08:31 pm:

I lack a wind drum but I have a Magic Target. Should I use the Magic Target or Moving Target? Does the Magic Target have better statgains than the Moving Target? If It does, is it worth the fatigue hit?

Not sure if this has an effect but I own a stress-free ranch. (Aroma pot/Wonder Well is always on my ranch)

By At the comp. on Wednesday, July 5, 2006 - 04:37 pm:

Depends the moving target is good for a str/def/acc monster so you can raise acc and def at once.However if you just want a good acc training gadget then use the Magic target about 23 max and less fullness and fatigue.

(P.S all lvl4 gadgets give 30 to the main stat and 25 to the secondary, don't know about the lowered stat though)
